title: Getting Started with Next.js
content: Next.js is a React framework that enables server-side rendering and static site generation. It makes building SEO-friendly and scalable apps easy. This post covers the basics to help you get started quickly.

title: Optimizing React Performance
content: React apps can become slow if not optimized properly. Learn how to use memoization, lazy loading, and code splitting to make your apps faster and smoother for users.

title: Modern CSS Techniques
